alert.note: Alert for Bradley; Hamilton; Polk (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 25 at 5:09PM CDT until July 25 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Bradley County in east Tennessee... Southwestern Polk County in east Tennessee... Southeastern Hamilton County in east Tennessee... * Until 700 PM EDT. * At 607 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cleveland, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cleveland, South Cleveland, East Cleveland, Wildwood Lake, Collegedale, Waterville, Conasauga, Hopewell, Red Clay State Park and Flint Springs. This includes Interstate 75 in Tennessee between mile markers 16 and 25. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
